LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You've learned a way to increase the number of spells you can prepare per day.
Benefit: You can prepare four more spells per day of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd ranks each. This ability does only affects arcanist spellbooks.

You've learned a way to increase the number of spells you can prepare per day.
Benefit: You can prepare four more spells per day of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd levels each. This ability only affects arcanist spellbooks.
Abundant Preparation

You've mastered a way to increase the number of spells you can prepare per day.
Benefit: You can prepare four more spells per day of 7th, 8th, and 9th levels each. This ability only affects arcanist spellbooks.
Greater Abundant Preparation

You've studied a way to increase the number of spells you can prepare per day.
Benefit: You can prepare four more spells per day of 4th, 5th, and 6th levels each. This ability only affects arcanist spellbooks.
Improved Abundant Preparation

You gain one additional mythic ability. You must meet the prerequisites for this mythic ability.
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another mythic ability.
Extra Mythic Ability

You gain one additional mythic feat. You must meet the prerequisites for this mythic feat.
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another mythic feat.
Extra Mythic Feat
This spell functions like mage armor except you gain a +6 armor bonus. This bonus does not stack with other sources that grant an armor bonus.
This spell functions like mage armor except you gain a +6 armor bonus. This bonus does not stack with other sources that grant an armor bonus.
Mage Armor II
This spell functions like mage armor except you gain a +8 armor bonus. This bonus does not stack with other sources that grant an armor bonus.
This spell functions like mage armor except you gain a +8 armor bonus. This bonus does not stack with other sources that grant an armor bonus.
Mage Armor III
This spell functions like mage armor except you gain a +10 armor bonus. This bonus does not stack with other sources that grant an armor bonus.
This spell functions like mage armor except you gain a +10 armor bonus. This bonus does not stack with other sources that grant an armor bonus.
Mage Armor IV

This spell functions like shield, but its duration is longer and it can be employed like a tower shield for cover.[LONGSTART]

Shield creates an invisible shield of force that hovers in front of you. It negates magic missile attacks directed at you. The disk als oprovides a +4 shield bonus to AC. This bonus applies against incorporeal touch attacks, since it is a force effect. The shield has no armor check penalty or arcane spell failure</g}.[LONGEND]
1 hour/level

This spell functions like shield, but its duration is longer and it can be employed like a tower shield for cover.[LONGSTART]

Shield creates an invisible shield of force that hovers in front of you. It negates magic missile attacks directed at you. The disk als oprovides a +4 shield bonus to AC. This bonus applies against incorporeal touch attacks, since it is a force effect. The shield has no armor check penalty or arcane spell failure</g}.[LONGEND]
Shield II
